data.name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel IV - Ride-Along Set
data.detailed_description:
Need an adventuring buddy? Let EVERYONE come along!

Ride-Along Millium x 10
Ride-Along Rixia x 10
Ride-Along Maiden Towa x 10
Ride-Along Aurelia x 10

*These items can be claimed from the DLC tab on the Item page. After obtaining the items, they can be equipped from the Costume page on the Camp Menu.
